resources.string: Congratulation! \n Your feedback \n has been saved
17854 NE 5 Ave Miami, FL 33162\nPhone: 305-791-7997 Fax: 305 514 0596\nLicense #: US DOT 1717780 MC 629981

SHIPPER IS REQUESTED TO READ THIS DOCUMENT BEFORE SIGNING ASK FOR AN EXPLANATION OF ANYTHING NOT CLEAR OR INCONSISTENT WITH ANY PREVIOUS REPRESENTATION. THIS WILL CONFIRM INSTRUCTIONS AND AUTHORIZE YOU TO MOVE, SHIP, PACK, STORE, AND / OR PERFORM THE SERVICE HEREON

THE TOTAL COST IS BASED ON AN HOURLY RATE ONLY. SHOULD THERE BE ANY OTHER SERVICES REQUESTED, ADDITIONAL COSTS WILL BE CHARGED. TRAVEL TIME FROM PICKUP TO DELIVERY POINTS WILL BE ADDED AS BILLABLE LABORS HOURS.TRAVEL TIME FROM OFFICE WILL NOT BE CHARGED UNLESS IS SPECIFIED IN YOUR QUOTE ABOVE. THE PRICE INCLUDES LOADING / UNLOADING, ASSEMBLY / DISASSEMBLY, TAX, LABOR, FUEL, INSURANCE AND MOVING BLANKETS TO PROTECT NON-FRAGILE ITEMS. INSURANCE COVERAGE REQUIRES COMPLETE AND COMPREHENSIVE PACKING OF ALL VALUED ITEMS. ASSIGNED SHIPPING ITEMS THAT ARE NOT PROTECTED, SECURED, AND / OR PACKED WILL BE SERVICE PACKED AT THE CUSTOMER IS EXPENSE. SERVICE PACKING OF ITEMS WILL BE AT THE MOVER IS DISCRETION. CUSTOMER MAY RESTRICT ANY COMPANY SERVICE PACKING, BY WAIVER FORM, PRIOR TO THE COMMENCEMENT OF THE OPERATION. WAIVERS, BY DEFAULT, WILL PRECLUDE COMPLETE INSURANCE AND/OR PACKED WILL BE SERVICE PACKED AT THE CUSTOMER IS EXPENSE. SERVICE PACKING OF ITEMS WILL BE AT THE MOVER IS DISCRETION. CUSTOMER MAY RESTRICT ANY COMPANY SERVICE PACKING, BY WAIVER FORM, PRIOR TO 711E COMMENCEMENT OF THE OPERATION. WAIVERS, BY DEFAULT, WILL PRECLUDE COMPLETE INSURANCE COVERAGE OF STATED WAIVED ITEM(S), AND RENDERS MOVE FOR LESS NON-LIABLE FOR ANY DAMAGE THAT MAY OCCUR DURING TRANSPORT. PACKING SUPPLIES SUCH AS, AND NOT LIMITED TO, BUBBLE WRAP, TAPE, PLASTIC WRAP, BOXES (INCLUDING T.V. BOX) ETC. ARE NOT INCLUDED IN THE PRICE. FOR CUSTOMER SERVICE ASSISTANCE WITH PICKUP OR DELIVERY SCHEDULES, BILLING OR OTHER CUSTOMER SERVICE MATTERS, PLEASE CALL (888) 668-3712. WE ARE NOT RESPONSIBLE FOR CANCELLATIONS DUE TO CIRCUMSTANCES BEYOND OUR CONTROL. WE CAN BEAT ANY QUOTE OUT THERE. WE HAVE BEEN IN BUSINESS FOR OVER 10 YEARS, FULLY INSURED AND BONDED. WE ARE AN AUTHORIZED MOVING COMPANY WITH MOVINGINSURANCE.COM.
